The doors all around the two bots closed, "Oh frag" Razor claw yelled as he
set himself to put up his shield. Before the mutant could act several shots
struck him in the back. (What types of weapons are we dealing with?)  forced
off balance the Raptor wouldn't be able to use his forcefield and
transforming to Wolverine was out of the question as well, his speed was
ineffective if he had no place to go.

Elsewhere Foxfingers stayed to the shadows avoiding video cameras. He knew
that his position was vulnerable, he also knew that he was getting low on
toys. He'd always been prepared for anything but this was one situation that
even the best preperation wasn't enough for the Black Fortress.

Outside Lunarpine continued his Ballet of death (Dramatic isn't it?) On all
sides he had something shooting at him. One by one he knew the relays were
being destroyed and the only thing keeping the defenses from getting a lock
on him wasthe dampner he was useing. The Bat probes weaponry was anoying at
best, they were obviously designed as scouts and not fighters. He managed to
pin one down for a moment, "I tried to be diplomatic" he said into it
knowing that the Preds would be listening.  He leapt forward avoiding
another shot landing near a swooping bat, "I tried to reach a peacefull
solution,"  The wolf spun useing his tail to swat the probe harmlessly away.
The furious former Maximal was nearing a state of rage as the welcoming
comittee got ever close to him,  He snapped his head to the side grabbing
another probe damaging the wing, "But if force is the only thing you
understand then go ahead and destroy us, Turn the virus we carry into a
plague, You will end up destroying us but in the process you'll contract the
plague and wipe yourselves out as well and eventually wipe out the whole
planet." The wolf was exagerating about all of them carrying the virus but
the Preds didn't know that. Without samples of each of thier individual
energeon thre was no way of telling who had the virus. "But if destruction
is what you want then enjoy." The bats signal ended with a crunch as
Lunarpines teeth sank into it's functioning circuitry, those words would be
the last thing that the bat would ever send.

From: <airly2000@...>

Subject: thieves and trapped/Outside the BlackFortrress


> BlackFortress defences/Kali::
>
> The blackfortress defences continue to shot against Lunarpine; Kali
> was checking the computer, looking for the intruders and she saw
> thanks at the video camera that Ender was doing a deal with the
> intruders, she pressed several buttons and advice to Shivah, while
> she was telling hin what was going on all the doors, where Ender and
> the intruder were, closed and locked down -that doors had been made
> in that way that a normal weapon couldn't damage them. In the top of
> the room appeared several weapons and they started to shot against
> the mutants and ender.
>
